ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Striker.  She then looked at Prebon.  She felt a surge of energy flow through her.  The chip was taking her over, slowly. She didn t know how

::Spears:;

She looked at Striker.  She then looked at Prebon.  She felt a surge 
of energy flow through her.  The chip was taking her over, slowly.  
She didn't know how much of herself she could save. Or for how long.  
She looked at Striker."Your in no position to state anything.  You 
will show My Master the respect."  She looked at Prebon and smiled.   



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker chuckles, realizing that he was in a rather strange 
position 
> to be doing the chuckling. His scanners were recording as much data 
> as possible on the chip, and he needed just a bit more time.
> 
> "Respect or not," Striker says calmly, "Ramulus won't go to you 
> without preparation, no matter who you have hostage. I've worked 
with 
> the bot, I know him. I can lead him to you."
> 
> His eyes narrow, looking at Prebon, "All I ask is that you let her 
go 
> with me. Its up to you. You can either have Ramulus, or us two."
>
